speaker: Greeter
text: Welcome to ORBITAL SPACEPORT. Don’t block the cargo lanes.

speaker: Greeter
text: If you’re looking for upgrades, the shipwright is two doors down.

speaker: Shipwright
text: I can tune your ship to survive the ugly parts of space.

speaker: Shipwright
text: CHOICE: Buy Asteroid Sensor (200) -> shipwright_buy_sensor | Buy Deep Space Engine (600) -> shipwright_buy_engine | Nevermind -> END

speaker: Shipwright
text: Asteroid Sensor installed. Your nav will now detect dense rock fields.

speaker: Shipwright
text: Come back when you’ve got the funds for something spicier.

speaker: Shipwright
text: Deep Space Engine installed. You can cross the long dark gaps now.

speaker: Medic
text: Sit. Breathe. I’ll patch up your team and your nerves.

speaker: Medic
text: CHOICE: Heal everyone -> heal_center_done | Leave -> END

speaker: Medic
text: All set. Try not to get vaporized out there.

speaker: Ari
text: Oh—hi. You’re not from around here.

speaker: Ari
text: The docks make everyone look lonely. Even when they’re not.

speaker: Ari
text: CHOICE: Flirt -> romance_p3a_flirt | Be polite -> romance_p3a_polite | Leave -> END

speaker: Ari
text: Bold. I respect that. Talk again when the station lights dim.

speaker: Ari
text: Polite is rare. Don’t lose that.

speaker: NavConsole
text: WARNING: Your ship cannot safely enter this region.
